info.description:
Beginning on October 2, 2020, you will need an API key to access the TSDR REST API See https://account.uspto.gov/api-manager and the uspto's TSDR Data API webpage for more information on retrieving bulk data.

 Click on the Authorize box and enter your api key.  It is required and will be sent on all requests.

 This uses the uspto's swagger object with a number of changes.  The uspto's api does not allow browser request (CORS issues) so requests from this page will not actually work.  The generated curl commands will work and the modified swagger object can be imported into postman.
info.title: TSDR REST API Specification

tags: Images
get.summary: Returns an image for the serial number specified.
get.description: Parameter is the digits only of the serial number, no leading sn. Example: https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/rawImage/78787878

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.description: digits only

200.description: Successful retrieval of the serial number's image

400.description: Invalid format for the serial number parameter

404.description: Image for the serial number specified does not exist

tags: Resource for retrieving data for multiple cases.
get.summary: Returns case details for multiple cases as a JSON.
get.description: Parameters can be one of the following: rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers. Example: https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/caseMultiStatus/sn?ids=78787878,76767676

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: from is one of the number types listed above

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: to is one of the number types listed above

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: can be serial numbers, ref numbers, reg numbers seperated by commas

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
type:
 * `sn` - serial number(s)
 * `rn` - registration number(s)
 * `ref` - reference number(s)
 * `ir` -  Madrid number(s)

200.description: Successful retrieval of Controller for retrieving data for multiple cases

204.description: Controller for retrieving data for multiple cases is empty

400.description: Invalid format for multiple cases parameter

404.description: Controller for retrieving data for multiple cases is does not exist

tags: Resource for retrieving information and content pertaining to a single case document, including the individuals pages thereof
get.summary: Returns the content of a Document in PDF format.
get.description: Parameters can be one of the following: rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers. Example: https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedoc/sn78787878/NOA20070926100613/content.pdf

parameters.name: caseid
parameters.description: one of the following: rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers

parameters.name: docid
parameters.description: Auto generated Unique Document ID

200.description: Successful retrieval of ZIP file for case ID parameter & Document Id

204.description: No Documents for the  case ID parameter & Document Id

400.description: Invalid format for case ID parameter & Document Id

404.description: Trademark for case ID parameter & Document Id does not exist

parameters.name: caseid
parameters.description: one the following: rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers

tags: Resource for retrieving information and content pertaining to a single case document, including the individuals pages thereof
get.summary: Returns the page content as a NATIVE format

parameters.name: caseid
parameters.description: one the following: rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers

parameters.name: docid
parameters.description: Auto generated Unique Document ID

parameters.name: pageid
parameters.description: Page Number

200.description: Successful retrieval of page content for case ID parameter & Document Id

204.description: No pages for the  case ID parameter & Document Id

400.description: Invalid format for case ID parameter & Document Id

404.description: Trademark for case ID parameter & Document Id does not exist

tags: Resource for retrieving data for multiple cases.
get.summary: Obtains metadata for a document bundle for the given query params in XML format.
get.description:
Digits can be entered in one of the first four parameters. rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers. Examples: https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedocs/bundle.xml?sn=75757575,78787878 Metadata (in XML) about all documents for Serial Number 75008897 sent/received during 2006 https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedocs/bundle.xml?sn=75008897&fromdate=2006-01-01&todate=2006-12-31 Metadata (in XML) about all documents for International Registration Number 0835690 sorted from earliest to latest https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedocs/bundle.xml?ir=0835690&sort=date:A

Note: exactly one of rn,sn,ref,ir must be specified, like sn or ir in the examples

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: start of date range

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: end of date range

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort field:[A|D] for ascending or descending

200.description: Successful retrieval of all documents in the case in PDF format

400.description: Invalid format for case ID parameter

404.description: Documents for the case ID does not exist

tags: Resource for retrieving data for multiple cases.
get.summary: Obtains metadata for a document bundle for the given query params in PDF format.
get.description:
Digits can be entered in one of the first four parameters. rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers. Examples: https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedocs/bundle.pdf?sn=75757575,78787878 or https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedocs/bundle.pdf?sn=72131351,76515878&type=SPE Documents sent/received on Nov 30th, 2003 for Serial Number 72-131351 as a PDF https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedocs/bundle.pdf?sn=72131351&date=2003-11-30  

Note: exactly one of rn,sn,ref,ir must be specified, like sn in the examples

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: set to RC to retrieve only registration certificate(s)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: set to SPE to retrieve only specimens

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: specific send/receive date

200.description: Successful retrieval of all documents in the case in PDF format

400.description: Invalid format for case ID parameter

404.description: Documents for the case ID does not exist

tags: Resource for retrieving data for multiple cases.
get.summary: Obtains metadata for a document bundle for the given query params in ZIP format.
get.description:
Parameters can be one of the following: rnXXXXXXX for US registration number, snXXXXXXXX for US serial number, refXXXXXXXX and irXXXXXXX for Madrid numbers. Example: https://tsdrapi.uspto.gov/ts/cd/casedocs/bundle.zip?sn=75757575,78787878

Note: only one parameter can be specified, like sn in the example

200.description: Successful retrieval of all documents in the case in PDF format

400.description: Invalid format for case ID parameter

404.description: Documents for the case ID does not exist
